document.full_text: rising temperatures around the core of one of the reactors at japan's quake-crippled nuclear plant sparked new concern on tuesday and more water was needed to cool it down, the plant's operator said.
document.title: japan fights crippled nuclear plant, radiation fears
lines_and_colors: rising temperatures around the core of one of the reactors at japan's quake-crippled nuclear plant sparked new concern on tuesday and more water was needed to cool it down, the plant's operator said.
